Package de.bp2019.pusl.service

Class AuthenticationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bp2019.pusl.service.AuthenticationService
  • @Service
@Scope("session")
public class AuthenticationService
extends Object
    Service providing current authentication details. Bean is stateful to improve performance. The authenticated User Object is kept in session memory so that it doesnt have to be looked up from the database every time authentication details are requested
    Author:
    Leon Chemnitz

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Clear the cached version of User object stored in memory. Forces a Reload from Database

        public void deauthenticate()
        Deauthenticate the currently logged in user and navigate to login view

      • currentUserFullName

        public String currentUserFullName()
        Returns the Full name of the currently logged in User. Returns the users email address if no firstname is set
        Returns:
        Full name of current user
